00014 // .NAME vtkMrmlModelNode - MRML node to represent a 3D surface model.
00015 // .SECTION Description
00016 // Model nodes describe polygonal data.  They indicate where the model is 
00017 // stored on disk, and how to render it (color, opacity, etc).  Models 
00018 // are assumed to have been constructed with the orientation and voxel 
00019 // dimensions of the original segmented volume.
00020 
00021 #ifndef __vtkMrmlModelNode_h
00022 #define __vtkMrmlModelNode_h
00023

00025 //#include <fstream.h>

00037 #include <vector.h>

00039 using namespace std;
00040 
00041 class VTK_SLICER_BASE_EXPORT vtkMrmlModelNode : public vtkMrmlNode
00042 {
00043 public:
00044   static vtkMrmlModelNode *New();
00045   vtkTypeMacro(vtkMrmlModelNode,vtkMrmlNode);
00046   void PrintSelf(ostream& os, vtkIndent indent);
00047   
00048   //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00049   // Utility Functions
00050   //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00051 
00052   // Description:
00053   // Write the node's attributes to a MRML file in XML format
00054   void Write(ofstream& of, int indent);
00055 
00056   // Description:
00057   // Copy the node's attributes to this object
00058   void Copy(vtkMrmlNode *node);
00059 
00060   // Description:
00061   // Model ID
00062   vtkSetStringMacro(ModelID);
00063   vtkGetStringMacro(ModelID);
00064   
00065   // Description:
00066   // Path of the data file, relative to the MRML file
00067   vtkSetStringMacro(FileName);
00068   vtkGetStringMacro(FileName);
00069 
00070   // Description:
00071   // Absolute Path of the data file
00072   vtkSetStringMacro(FullFileName);
00073   vtkGetStringMacro(FullFileName);
00074 
00075   // Description:
00076   // Name of the model's color, which is defined by a Color node in a MRML file
00077   vtkSetStringMacro(Color);
00078   vtkGetStringMacro(Color);
00079 
00080   // Description:
00081   // Opacity of the surface expressed as a number from 0 to 1
00082   vtkSetMacro(Opacity, float);
00083   vtkGetMacro(Opacity, float);
00084 
00085   // Description:
00086   // Indicates if the surface is visible
00087   vtkBooleanMacro(Visibility, int);
00088   vtkGetMacro(Visibility, int);
00089   vtkSetMacro(Visibility, int);
00090 
00091   // Description:
00092   // Specifies whether to clip the surface with the slice planes
00093   vtkBooleanMacro(Clipping, int);
00094   vtkGetMacro(Clipping, int);
00095   vtkSetMacro(Clipping, int);
00096 
00097   // Description:
00098   // Indicates whether to cull (not render) the backface of the surface
00099   vtkBooleanMacro(BackfaceCulling, int);
00100   vtkGetMacro(BackfaceCulling, int);
00101   vtkSetMacro(BackfaceCulling, int);
00102 
00103   // Description:
00104   // Indicates whether to render the scalar value associated with each polygon vertex
00105   vtkBooleanMacro(ScalarVisibility, int);
00106   vtkGetMacro(ScalarVisibility, int);
00107   vtkSetMacro(ScalarVisibility, int);
00108 
00109   // Description:
00110   // Indicates whether to render the vector value associated with each polygon vertex
00111   vtkBooleanMacro(VectorVisibility, int);
00112   vtkGetMacro(VectorVisibility, int);
00113   vtkSetMacro(VectorVisibility, int);
00114 
00115   // Description:
00116   // Indicates whether to render the tensor value associated with each polygon vertex
00117   vtkBooleanMacro(TensorVisibility, int);
00118   vtkGetMacro(TensorVisibility, int);
00119   vtkSetMacro(TensorVisibility, int);
00120 
00121   // Description:
00122   // Range of scalar values to render rather than the single color designated by colorName
00123   vtkSetVector2Macro(ScalarRange, vtkFloatingPointType);
00124   vtkGetVector2Macro(ScalarRange, vtkFloatingPointType);
00125 
00126   // Description:
00127   // Perform registration by setting the matrix that transforms this model
00128   // from its RAS (right-anterior-superior) space to the WLD (world) space
00129   // of the 3D scene it is a part of.
00130   void SetRasToWld(vtkMatrix4x4 *reg);
00131   vtkGetObjectMacro(RasToWld, vtkMatrix4x4);
00132 
00133     // Description:
00134     // Numerical ID of the color lookup table to use for rendering the overlay
00135     // for this model
00136     vtkGetStringMacro(LUTName);
00137     vtkSetStringMacro(LUTName);
00138 
00139     // Scalar overlay file list
00140 
00141     // Description:
00142     // number of scalar file names
00143     int GetNumberOfScalarFileNames();
00144     void AddScalarFileName(char *);
00145     const char *GetScalarFileName(int idx);
00146     void DeleteScalarFileNames();

00157   char *FullFileName;

00159     char *LUTName;
00160     
00161   // Numbers

00163 
00164   // Booleans
00165   int Visibility;
00166   int Clipping;

00168   int ScalarVisibility;
00169   int VectorVisibility;
00170   int TensorVisibility;
